title: CS540 Yingyu Liang Grading Threshold for B/AB/A
body: Simply title, if anyone has taken CS540 Intro to Artificial Intelligence, wanted to ask what the grading threshold for a B and AB and A are specifically. I stand at an 86%, calculated median is 91.8%, mean is 82%. What is the cutoff for an AB or A?
comments: I am wondering the same sitting at a 86 too
They just posted the grade distributions on piazza
